description: A secure and transparent decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) voting system where token holders can submit proposals and vote on them. The system ensures each token is counted once, prevents double-voting, calculates results, and automatically executes approved actions when a majority is reached.

functions.name: submitProposal
functions.description: Allows token holders to submit a new proposal for voting.

functions.name: vote
functions.description: Allows token holders to vote on a proposal using their tokens. Ensures each token is counted once and prevents double-voting.

functions.name: calculateResults
functions.description: Calculates the results of a proposal to determine if a majority is reached.

functions.name: executeApprovedAction
functions.description: Automatically executes the approved actions of a proposal when a majority is reached.

modifiers.name: onlyTokenHolder
modifiers.condition: msg.sender must be a token holder
modifiers.description: Restricts function access to token holders only.
